name: Dungeon Takeover
description:
Your dungeon has been taken over, dungeon master! Beat up your minions with your laser gun and knock out the evil villain who stole your dungeon!

Made for Lospec Jam 1.

Controls:

A or Left-Alt to Shoot.

Space to Jump.

D-PAD to Move. (D-Pad UP and DOWN to select buttons, RIGHT & LEFT for volume slider and movement.)

Escape - Options.

Enter - Enter Button.
